content: This is a **list of [museums](/wiki/Museum) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)**: ## National museums - [8Q SAM](/wiki/8Q_SAM) - [Asian Civilisations Museum](/wiki/Asian_Civilisations_Museum) (ACM) - [National Gallery Singapore](/wiki/National_Gallery_Singapore) - [National Museum of Singapore](/wiki/National_Museum_of_Singapore) - [Peranakan Museum](/wiki/Peranakan_Museum) - [Singapore Art Museum](/wiki/Singapore_Art_Museum) (SAM) ## Other museums - [Air Force Museum](/wiki/Singapore_Air_Force_Museum) - [ArtScience Museum](/wiki/ArtScience_Museum) ([Marina Bay Sands](/wiki/Marina_Bay_Sands)) - [Baba House](/wiki/Baba_House) ([National University of Singapore](/wiki/National_University_of_Singapore)) - [The Battle Box](/wiki/The_Battle_Box) - [Children's Museum Singapore](/wiki/Children%27s_Museum_Singapore) - [Fort Siloso](/wiki/Fort_Siloso) ([Sentosa](/wiki/Sentosa)) - [Former Ford Factory](/wiki/Former_Ford_Factory) - [Fuk Tak Chi Museum](/wiki/Fuk_Tak_Chi_Museum) - [Images of Singapore](/wiki/Images_of_Singapore) (Sentosa) - [The Intan](/wiki/The_Intan) - JCU Museum of Video and Computer Games - [Lee Kong Chian Natural History Museum](/wiki/Lee_Kong_Chian_Natural_History_Museum) ([National University of Singapore](/wiki/National_University_of_Singapore)) - Little Mori's Silkworm Museum - [Madame Tussauds Singapore](/wiki/Madame_Tussauds_Singapore) (Sentosa) - [Mint Museum of Toys](/wiki/Mint_Museum_of_Toys) - [NUS Museum](/wiki/NUS_Museum) (National University of Singapore) - Red Dot Design Museum Singapore - The Republic of Singapore Navy Museum - [Sports Museum](/wiki/Sports_Museum_(Singapore)) - The Gem Museum - Trick Eye Museum - The Live Turtle and Tortoise Museum - Buddha Tooth Relic and Temple Museum - Hell's Museum - Museum of Ice Cream Singapore - Fort Canning Heritage Gallery - Singapore Musical Box Museum - MINT Museum of Toys - Ode To Art - Singapore Chinese Opera Museum - [Vintage Camera Museum](/wiki/Vintage_Camera_Museum) ## Heritage institutions - Chinatown Heritage Centre - [Chinese Heritage Centre](/wiki/Chinese_Heritage_Centre) - [Civil Defence Heritage Gallery](/wiki/Civil_Defence_Heritage_Gallery) - Heritage Conservation Centre {HCC) - [Indian Heritage Centre](/wiki/Indian_Heritage_Centre) (IHC) - [Malay Heritage Centre](/wiki/Malay_Heritage_Centre) - [National Archives of Singapore](/wiki/National_Archives_of_Singapore) (NAS) - Police Heritage Centre - [Reflections at Bukit Chandu](/wiki/Reflections_at_Bukit_Chandu) (RBC) - [Science Centre Singapore](/wiki/Science_Centre_Singapore) - Singapore Chinese Cultural Centre - [Singapore City Gallery](/wiki/Singapore_City_Gallery) ([URA](/wiki/Urban_Redevelopment_Authority)) - [Singapore Discovery Centre](/wiki/Singapore_Discovery_Centre) - [Sun Yat Sen Nanyang Memorial Hall](/wiki/Sun_Yat_Sen_Nanyang_Memorial_Hall) - Eurasian Heritage Gallery - [List of memorials in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_memorials_in_Singapore) - [List of tourist attractions in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_tourist_attractions_in_Singapore) - National Heritage Board - Museums and heritage centres - National Heritage Board's List of Museums (updated as of Nov 2021) - Little Mori's Silkworm Museum
title: List of museums in Singapore
